identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a unique, tactical, and high-performance gaming command center.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Military UI with Sci-Fi HUD aesthetics.
Emotion First: The user should feel like a Commander in a war room.
Content is King: Data and Guides are the ammunition.
Negative Space: Use it to separate high-density data clusters.
Contrast: High contrast (Gold on Black) for readability and impact.

tech_stack.language: JavaScript (ES6+) or TypeScript (preferred for data safety)
tech_stack.icons: FontAwesome (migrating to Lucide-React or Phosphor Icons recommended for React)

rules: Use 'grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12' for main dashboard layouts.
Hero section spans full width or 'col-span-8'.
Always use gap-6 or gap-8 to prevent clutter.

elements: Actions: Search (Command Palette style), Theme Toggle (Ghost/Gift mode)

guide_card.effects: Hover: Border glows Gold, Image zooms slightly, 'Target Locked' corner markers appear.

tool_card.structure: Icon top-right (large, opacity 10%), Title left, Action button bottom

buttons.primary: Clip-path polygon shape (chamfered corners), bold text, pulsing glow effect on hover.
buttons.secondary: Ghost button with 1px border, monospace font.

ads.design: Encapsulate ads in a 'Sponsored Intel' frame with a striped hazard border at the bottom to distinguish them from content. Maintain exact dimensions requested by AdSense.

steps: 2. Install dependencies: tailwindcss, framer-motion, lucide-react, react-router-dom.
3. Create 'Layout' component with Header/Footer and Adsense slots.
4. Port 'index.html' content to 'Home.jsx' using the new Bento Grid components.
6. Rebuild 'NoyzBot' as a floating React component using the existing Gemini/Groq API logic.
7. Ensure all 'data-testid' attributes are added for testing.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure Gold text on Dark background meets 4.5:1 (use lighter Gold #fbbf24 or #fcd34d for text).

instructions_to_main_agent: You are rebuilding a static HTML site into a modern React application. Use the existing 'index.html' as your content source. The design must be 'Tactical/Military' using the colors and fonts specified. Preserve all AdSense and Analytics IDs. Create the folder structure '/app/frontend' for the new React app if it doesn't exist, or use the root if instructed. Prefer creating a clean 'src' structure.
